name: Vet Consultation
description: Veterinary consultation notes for UK practices

sections.title: Consultation Summary
sections.instruction: Brief 1-2 sentence summary using only information explicitly stated - patient name, species, and primary reason for visit

sections.title: Patient Details
sections.instruction: Only include details explicitly mentioned: name, species, breed, age, sex, weight. Use 'unknown' for any details not stated in the transcript

sections.title: Owner
sections.instruction: Owner's name as stated in the transcript (e.g., 'Mrs Patterson', 'John'). Return null only if no owner name is mentioned

sections.title: Presenting Complaint
sections.instruction: Only symptoms or concerns the owner explicitly described. Do not add typical symptoms that weren't mentioned

sections.title: Clinical History
sections.instruction: Only include medical history explicitly discussed. If no history mentioned, return null

sections.title: Clinical Examination
sections.instruction: Only include examination findings the vet explicitly stated during the consultation. Do not infer findings from symptoms

sections.title: Diagnosis
sections.instruction: Only include diagnoses the vet explicitly stated, not symptoms or suspected conditions. If vet said 'could be' or 'possibly', include as differential

sections.title: Treatment Plan
sections.instruction: Only treatments explicitly recommended or administered. Do not add standard treatments that weren't mentioned

sections.title: Medications
sections.instruction: Only medications explicitly prescribed. Use exact names and dosages as stated. Use null for dosage or duration if not specified

sections.title: Follow-up
sections.instruction: Only follow-up instructions explicitly given. Use exact timeframes stated (e.g., 'in two weeks', 'if symptoms persist'). If no follow-up mentioned, return null

sections.title: Advice to Owner
sections.instruction: Only home care instructions explicitly given by the vet. If no advice was given, return empty array []
